State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Slight tweaks to dialogue with Spawn Astarion at the epilogue party to make the most out of the conversation, including more hugs and asking him about Cazador's mansion.
State.Name: Spawn Astarion - Epilogue Edits

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new hair colors to CC. Includes natural & colorful tones and options for matching eyebrows and eyelashes.
State.Name: Astralities' Hair Color Supplement

State.Author: Kiwi Lifter
State.Description: A simple mod giving a slight stat boost to Aylin and Isobel to make them more credible as powerful allies.
State.Name: Better Aylin AND Isobel

State.Author: Kiwi Defender
State.Description: Practice safe gaming: protect yourself! Get a Shield, and make sure your partner has one too!
State.Name: Better Shields

State.Author: Cheek
State.Description: Adds your companions to the list of allies able to be summoned during the Final Battle.
State.Name: Call Your Companions

State.Author: wes47
State.Description: Makes paper background darker for Books, Notes and Scrolls.
State.Name: Darker Paper

Original.Name: Druid Quality of Life - Hotbar Restore-5877-1-0-1-1705846324.zip

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: A script that copies your hotbar when you enter Wild Shape and restores it upon leaving it. Works with other polymorph effects that change your hotbar.
State.Name: Druid Quality of Life - Hotbar Restore

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Overhauls triggers for starting Karlach's romance. Act 1 & Act 2.
State.Name: Firestarter - Karlach Romance Overhaul

State.Author: lexo1000
State.Description: Enhance your Baldur's Gate 3 adventures with gem-inspired dice and a refined rolling interface, making every decision and challenge a visually immersive experience.
State.Name: Immersive Dice Roll

State.Author: Aetherpoint
State.Description: This mod enables the unused glowmap Larian Studios created for Karlach's horns. Making the script on her horns glow, and pulse at the same rate as her heart.
State.Name: Karlach's Glowing Horns

State.Author: Dehuman--Sinbane
State.Description: Alters the Light, Daylight and Dancing Lights spells with some quality of life features such as reapplying the effects, auto-dimming in sunlight, toggling them off/on and a full rework of Dancing Lights to make it behave more like Candlelight from Skyrim. Light when you need, not when you don't!
State.Name: Light Utility (QoL - Autolight - Toggle - Reapply - Autodim - Candlelight)

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Allows easily uninstalling mods, making it possible to remove them from the load order, via the MCM window or SE console.
State.Name: Mod Uninstaller

State.Author: robogena
State.Description: Removes visual effects for Nature’s Step, so you can get back to looking at the dryad. I mean, the gameplay.
State.Name: No Nature's Step Effects

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: Halsin will no longer confess to you in act 2 or 3. You will only get the platonic versions of those conversations even if you accidentally flirt with him.
State.Name: Platonic Halsin (Halsin Never Confesses)

State.Author: gosh
State.Description: Adds shadows to light cast by torches. Fixes erroneous light reflections and light bleeding through objects. Actors, architecture, items cast shadows in torchlight. Make game more moody. Make game more gorgeous.
State.Name: Shadowed Torches (now with Shadowcasting)

State.Author: MangoPunch
State.Description: Adds extra in-game animations as poses in Photo Mode.
State.Name: Strike a Pose - Extra poses for Photo Mode

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: A library mod for my other mods. Forked from Focus Core.
State.Name: Volition Cabinet

State.Author: Driwell
State.Description:
A set of two themes for Mod Organizer 2 using the Catppuccin color palette, Mocha (dark) and Latte (light).

I took some liberties in relation to the community style guide, I push heavier than usual on the amount of colors I use from the palette since I believe they work so well together that it's a waste not not go a bit crazy. Hope you enjoy
State.Name: Catppuccin Themes for Mod Organizer 2

State.Author: kassent
State.Description: This is NativeModLoader, used to load any native dll plugins within bin\NativeMods\ folder.
State.Name: Native Mod Loader

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Elevate the CPU Priority of the game process.

Improve overall performance and Prevent stutters caused by other processes.
State.Name: Baldur's Priority - CPU Performance FPS Optimizer

State.Author: Dragozino
State.Description: A Mod Organizer 2 Plugin for Baldur's Gate 3 that offers multiple features including load order generation.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 - Unofficial MO2 Support

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds subtle Arm, Leg and Tail gradients to Body Textures. Available for all Races and Body Types (excluding Dragonborn).
State.Name: Astra's Subtle Gradient Body Textures

Original.Name: Half Light Voicelines for Durge Voice 5-13975-1-1732468516.zip

State.Author: alkalineee
State.Description: Become even more paranoid and ill-advised.
State.Name: Half Light Voicelines for Durge Voice 5

State.Author: reyqune
State.Description: Overhauls the difficulty portraits with a bit more Pride
State.Name: Rainbow Difficulty Replacer

State.Author: anshela
State.Description: Exactly what it says on the tin.  May not be optimal for all races/body types.
State.Name: Smaller Lutes

State.Author: drkekyll
State.Description: Reworks See Invisibility to reveal invisible creatures without removing their invisibility (no save). Also changes the conditions for losing invisibility to better reflect RAW.
State.Name: (See) Invisibility Rework

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Unlocks the "but you're MY leaking blood-bag" line for The Dark Urge. That's it. That's the mod.
State.Name: Astarion Act 3 - But you're MY leaking blood-bag

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod expands the natural skintone selection by adding lighter and darker shades to Vanilla skintones, as well as new options. This version includes only natural skintones.
State.Name: Astralities' Skintone Expansion - Natural Tones

State.Author: Caites and Sniffx
State.Description: Improves character sheet panel and TAB party panel.
State.Name: Better Character and Party Panels

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes split item menu more responsive and adds min/max button.
State.Name: Slightly Better Split Item Menu

State.Author: Kvalyr
State.Description: Adds visual notifications to tell the player when they should long rest due to camp night events and dialogues waiting to play out.
State.Name: Camp Event Notifications

State.Author: Stanto
State.Description: Now truly, the shadow-fell upon the land. I really hope you brought a torch.
State.Name: Darker Shadowlands

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Dynamically scales party portraits on sidebar to allow them fit the screen without scrolling. Up to 16 characters in party supported.
State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

State.Author: Arkronos
State.Description:
This mod fixes the random keybinding with the "Jump/Fly" abilities.

If you can fly, the shortcut to jump will make you fly instead.
State.Name: Fix Jump-Fly Shortcut

State.Author: lexo1000
State.Description: This mod enhances readability and immersion by introducing clearer interface font, adjusting book textures brightness and simplifying their interfaces, making every text interaction in the game visually appealing and comfortable for the eyes.
State.Name: Immersive Reading

State.Author: perseidipity
State.Description: Material library for my hair mods. Does nothing on it's own but can be used by other modders as a resource.
State.Name: Kay's Material Library

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Removes Half-Illithid eyes and lessens the intensity of the scarring. If you want to fully remove the scarring, use my other mod, 'Normal Half Illithid'.
State.Name: Lighter Half Illithid

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description:
Fixes dialogue with Mol. 



If you Stole Mattis' Ring, Grabbed Silfy etc... you will have to persuade Mol to give you another chance. However, after persuading, Mol refuses to talk to you.
State.Name: Mol Persuasion Bug Fix

Original.Name: No Press Any Key Menu for MCM-745-1-9-0-1744828870.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: No "Press Any Key to continue" stop to Main menu.
State.Name: No Press Any Key Menu

State.Author: Poesielibre
State.Description: This mod adds 98 new options to the scale color selection. This mod focuses on texture rather than color. There are 7 scale color each declined in 14 different textures.
State.Name: Poesielibre's Dark Urge Scale Collection

State.Author: gosh
State.Description: Adds shadows to light cast by torches. Fixes erroneous light reflections and light bleeding through objects. Actors, architecture, items cast shadows in torchlight. Make game more moody. Make game more gorgeous.
State.Name: Shadowed Torches (now with Shadowcasting)

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Fixes dialogue bugs at the Sussur flower for Astarion, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, and Wyll
State.Name: Sussur Flower Dialogue Bug Fixes

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: Keeps custom appearance modifications for Shadowheart during her Act 3 romance scene.
State.Name: Waterproof Shadowheart

State.Author: ArtByMari and Astralities
State.Description: Conversions of Mari's various Tattoo, Makeup & Scar Mods to function alongside KAVT! Includes custom CC icons.
State.Name: Mari's Tattoos Makeup and Scars for KAVT

State.Author: Koralina
State.Description: This mod replaces Astarion's head model and normal map with their slightly edited version. The edits are very subtle and aim to make Astarion younger, as he should be canonically.
State.Name: (Very) Subtle Astarion Edit

State.Author: Aether
State.Description: Fixes Astarion's Character Creation cameras if you have a mod which edits his Origins.lsx node.
State.Name: Astarion Character Creation Camera Fix

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds a variety of new fantastical and unnatural skintones with a wide range of shades to CC.
State.Name: Astralities' Wondrous Skintones

State.Author: Caites and Sniffx
State.Description: Improves character sheet panel and TAB party panel.
State.Name: Better Character and Party Panels

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds more contextual info to Target Info panel (resistances/vulnerabilities, item value, number of items in containers etc).
State.Name: Better Target Info

State.Author: Mharius
State.Description: Get ready for your extensive loot hoarding with plenty of options to bolster your carry weight limit. Ranges from a minor x1.5 increase all the way up to the quite legendary x9000!
State.Name: Carry Weight Increased - Up To Over 9000

State.Author: Stanto
State.Description:
Lady Shar prefers the lights off.



Felt that the Shar temple, House of Grief and Shar Camp shouldn't be lightly obscured? Wanted to be in the full dark? Ever thought it was generally too bright?



Welcome to the darker shar temple. Bring a torch, dark vision or dancing lights.
State.Name: Darker Shar Temple

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Dynamically scales party portraits on sidebar to allow them fit the screen without scrolling. Up to 16 characters in party supported.
State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically helps companions who get stuck or fall behind due to broken pathfinding by teleporting them or briefly boosting their jumps. 'Teleport Party To You', but autonomous.
State.Name: Fix Stragglers

State.Author: lexo1000
State.Description: This mod enhances readability and immersion by introducing clearer interface font, adjusting book textures brightness and simplifying their interfaces, making every text interaction in the game visually appealing and comfortable for the eyes.
State.Name: Immersive Reading

State.Author: Kazstralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a variety of new Scar presets to the game, including fresh, healing, aged and strangely discolored Scars. Compatible with KAVT.
State.Name: Kaz x Astralities - Scarred Visage

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: 5 new female head presets for elven races, humans, and tieflings based on the cast of Greta Gerwig's Little Women (2019).
State.Name: Little Women Head Presets by cedastarions

Original.Name: Mol Stolen Belongings Bug Fix (Set Flag)-1877-1-1-1718073779.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bug where the dialogue for Mol does not appear to return your stolen belongings.
State.Name: Mol Stolen Belongings Bug Fix

State.Author: robogena
State.Description: Removes VFX and SFX for temporary HP, plus Tharchiate Vigour visuals. Optional VFX/SFX removal for other buffs.
State.Name: No Temporary HP Effects

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: Male head presets for elves & drow.
State.Name: PRETTY BOYS by cedastarions

State.Author: gosh
State.Description: Adds shadows to light cast by torches. Fixes erroneous light reflections and light bleeding through objects. Actors, architecture, items cast shadows in torchlight. Make game more moody. Make game more gorgeous.
State.Name: Shadowed Torches (now with Shadowcasting)

State.Author: Cytraen
State.Description: Removes the need to rest between uses of tadpole/illithid dialogue options.
State.Name: Tadpole Dialogue Without Resting

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Adds a waypoint inside Emerald Grove. commuting is OVER.
State.Name: Waypoint Inside Emerald Grove

State.Author: NiverMK
State.Description: Automatically disables e-cores for game process.
State.Name: E-Cores Excluder

State.Author: reyqune
State.Description: A curated Baldur's Gate 3 mod list focused on a polished, slightly harder vanilla-like experience with quality-of-life upgrades and bug fixes for smoother gameplay.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Enhanced Edition

State.Author: Aahz
State.Description: Harmless library of code that does nothing by itself, forked from Focus Core. Only necessary if you use any of my SE mods: EasyCheat, ~EasyDye~, or [Redacted]
State.Name: AahzLib

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Overhauls Astarion's big Act 2 romance and platonic scenes. Get both romance scenes in one playthrough. Be Astarion's friend even when not romancing him.
State.Name: Astarion Confession Edit 2

Original.Name: Auntie Ethel - Dark Urge Dialogue Bug Fix (NoPrio)-8363-1-0-NoPrio-1711971985.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bugs with Auntie Ethel's scene in the grove when playing as the Dark Urge.
State.Name: Auntie Ethel - Dark Urge Dialogue Bug Fix (with Optional Astarion Priority)

State.Author: Caites and Sniffx
State.Description: Improves character sheet panel and TAB party panel.
State.Name: Better Character and Party Panels

State.Author: Caites and juumeijin
State.Description: Adds new information to tooltips and makes tooltips more readable. Also sort of framework for Artifact rarity.
State.Name: Better Tooltips

State.Author: Allindriss
State.Description: Claravel's "Emotes - Poses and Toggle Walk" mod's poses and animations added to in-game's photo mode.
State.Name: Claravel's Emotes for Photo Mode

State.Author: Stanto
State.Description:
Felt that the underdark shouldn't be lightly obscured? Wanted to be in the full dark? Ever thought the underdark was generally too bright?



Welcome to the darker underdark.
State.Name: Darker Underdark

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Dynamically scales party portraits on sidebar to allow them fit the screen without scrolling. Up to 16 characters in party supported.
State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

State.Author: jawstarion - EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Adds four types of recolorable fluffy animal tails for all body types and races (besides Dragonborn, as they don't have hair).
State.Name: FurryTails - Fluffy Animal Tail Collection

State.Author: AlanaSP ShinyHobo Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Changes existing UI to enhance the current modding scene by removing intrusive in-game warning and enhancing character creation options. Also provides optional files that replace UI elements based on player feedback
State.Name: ImprovedUI ReleaseReady

State.Author: Kazstralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a Body Tattoo selector to CC. Requires Unique Tav or KAVT and KaiLimeUI.
State.Name: Kazstra's CC Body Tattoo Selector

State.Author: Loulette
State.Description: Small mod adding heads for CC.
State.Name: Loulette Heads

Original.Name: Moonrise Towers Tadpole Cargo Dialogue Bug Fix-8015-1-0-1710639344.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes bug with Illithid and True Soul dialogue options.
State.Name: Moonrise Towers Tadpole Cargo Dialogue Bug Fix

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Your appearance stays the same after receiving Ethel's eye (both left and right work)
State.Name: Normal Hag's Eye

Original.Name: Priestess Gut Gonna Knock You Out-17344-1-0-0-3-1751529751.zip

State.Author: whatsontheflip
State.Description: Priestess Gut will knock elves/drow out when her sleeping potion doesn't work
State.Name: Priestess Gut Gonna Knock You Out

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of five vanilla hairstyles, but with flowers added! For all races/bodytypes!
State.Name: Short Flowery Hair

State.Author: KiwiLifter and darkynho
State.Description: Tav is an Aberration...and so are his friends!
State.Name: Tav is an Aberration

State.Author: Trips
State.Description: Re-releases old shader files to get around those pesky VT's. Modder's Resource and dependency for mods.
State.Name: Trips' Old Shader Pack

State.Author: Weeviljester
State.Description: A set of custom unique heads for character creation.
State.Name: Weeviljester's Draa'zvir Heads

State.Author: Team Me
State.Description: Makes the lyre smaller.
State.Name: Smaller Lyre

State.Author: StorybittenSoul
State.Description: This makes Fire Surfaces deal 1d4 Fire damage to any within, AND causes Burning for the normal 1d4 damage as well. Don't stand in Fire.
State.Name: Actual Fire Surface Damage Boost

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Unlocks the narrator's comments on the docks when Spawn Astarion runs from the sun. The narration exists in the vanilla game, but only plays if no other companions are around to comment.
State.Name: Astarion Docks Narration Unlocked

State.Author: Cahoot
State.Description: Nerfs Aura of Murder from Bhaalist Armour and Bhaalist enemies. Instead of the aura applying vulnerability to Piercing damage, it causes melee weapon attacks to deal additional Piercing damage to the target.
State.Name: Aura of Murder Rebalanced (Bhaalist Armour and Bhaalist Cultists)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes combat log tighter and draggable. Auto-hide and different scale versions available.
State.Name: Better Combat Log 2

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves initiative tracker - makes it tighter and adds more info about combatants.
State.Name: Slightly Better Topbar

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Speeds up loading by cleaning up database entries left behind by destroyed characters (mostly summons.) Especially impactful in Honour mode.
State.Name: Database Cleaner

State.Author: Aahz
State.Description: Provides a simple, multiplayer-compatible, in-game UI for access to cheaty things, including a searchable item spawner, and plans for more DebugBook-like things.
State.Name: EasyCheat with in-game UI (MCM)(SE)

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: All party members will speak in this scene, and Gale will ALWAYS say the "Dead. Spider." line instead of the alternative.
State.Name: G.A.L.E. - More Dead Spider Reactions

State.Author: MaskedRPGFan
State.Description: Initiative Variants. Vanilla is d4, this mod let you change it to d6, d8, d10, d12, d14, d16 or d18.
State.Name: Initiative Variants

State.Author: Kazstralities
State.Description: This Mod is a port of Unique Tav that adds additional features, including additional Tattoo, Makeup & Scar slots in CC, the option to use multiple Face and Body Tattoos, glowing Tattoos, Skin transparency, and more. Both Virtual Texture and Traditional Texture versions available.
State.Name: Kazstra's Virtual Tav x Tattoo Makeup and Scar Extender

State.Author: Astralities and Loulette
State.Description: This Mod adds compatibility with Unique Tav and KAVT to Loulette's Heads.
State.Name: Loulette Heads - Unique Tav and KAVT Patch

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: small collections of beards for Tav
State.Name: More beards

State.Author: Clowee
State.Description: Your appearance stays the same after receiving Volo's eye
State.Name: Normal Volo's Eye

State.Author: Rob Lapham
State.Description: Varies character heights by race to be more accurate with D&D source material instead of one size fits all.
State.Name: Racial Height Variation

State.Author: Cheek
State.Description: Due to an incorrect shapeshift rule, your Dream Guardian probably didn't show up when fighting against the Emperor if you customised their appearance. This mod fixes that by changing the shapeshift rule to no longer ignore custom looks!
State.Name: Show me my Dream Guardian

Original.Name: Tav with a Backstory - Scar Options-16782-1-1-1748573039.zip

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds new, rather severe Scar designs to CC. These new presets do not override Vanilla options.
State.Name: Tav with a Backstory - Heavy Scarring Options

State.Author: jjdoorframe
State.Description: Now with customizable maximum range! Ranged weapon attacks at full range anywhere, fully true to D&D 5e, with correct disadvantages and Sharpshooter now a real game-changer.
State.Name: True Range - 5e RAW

State.Author: Weeviljester
State.Description: A set of custom unique heads for character creation.
State.Name: Weeviljester's Ethereal Heads

State.Author: Ersh
State.Description: Native open source plugin providing several camera tweaks. Unlocked camera pitch, zoom, controller stick deadzone. No separate executables. Configurable.
State.Name: Native Camera Tweaks

State.Author: ArtByMari and Astralities
State.Description: Conversions of Mari's various Tattoo, Makeup & Scar Mods to function alongside KAVT! Includes custom CC icons.
State.Name: Mari's Tattoos Makeup and Scars for KAVT

State.Author: Team Me
State.Description: Makes the torches smaller, less like they're from a MOBA.
State.Name: Smaller Torches

Original.Name: Add Unarmed to Savage Attacker feat-2473-1-2-1695505704.zip

State.Author: jellytajm
State.Description: Add rerolls for unarmed attacks to the Savage Attacker feat. Add unarmed attacks to the Savage Attacks trait.
State.Name: Add Unarmed Attacks to Savage Attacker and Savage Attacks

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Makes romanced Astarion's greetings more varied
State.Name: Astarion's Greetings Edit

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description:
Automatically initiate lockpicking when interacting with locked chests and doors if you don't have the key. 

Configurable through a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Lockpicking

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Increases default size of container's grid available without scaling. Plus a few QoL improvements.
State.Name: Better Containers

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves initiative tracker - makes it tighter and adds more info about combatants.
State.Name: Slightly Better Topbar

Original.Name: Colorizer - Makeup and Tattoo Color Organizer-16656-1-0-1747534905.zip

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod unifies the color options available for Tattoos, Makeup and Lip Colors, sorts them, and fills in gaps with new additions.
State.Name: Colorizer - Makeup and Tattoo Color Organizer

State.Author: Koriik
State.Description: Restores Bane/Bhaal/Myrkul/Shar deities. Full dialogue support, no dependencies.
State.Name: Deities Restored (plus Shar Curse Immunity)

State.Author: Benenach and BaldursGoonsack
State.Description: Rebalances Cloud Giant Strength, Hill Giant Strength & Battlemage elixirs.
State.Name: Elixir Rebalance - Giant Strength and Battlemage Only

State.Author: freshcantaloupe42
State.Description: This mod fixes a bug that prevents setting up a certain flag which triggers the dialogue regarding choosing your partner over Gale.
State.Name: Gale Chose Partner Over Dialog Fix

State.Author: CunningShrike
State.Description: Invisible or hidden casters cannot be counterspelled. Blinded creatures cannot cast counterspell. v1.1: Stealthy spells including Subtle Spell cannot be counterspelled.
State.Name: Invisibiilty Counters Counterspell

State.Author: perseidipity
State.Description: Adds various braids, buns, and ponytails from vanilla hairs as a separate selection.
State.Name: Kay's Hair Extensions

State.Author: kharneth
State.Description: Turns Mage Armour inactive instead of removing it when you equip armor, and reactivate it when you unequip armor.
State.Name: Mage Armour - Quality of Life

Original.Name: More Heads for Flutter and Whimsy - UTAV-15888-1-1-0-1745073917.zip

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: More heads for Labotor's Flutter & Whimsy fairy race. Also compatible with all elven races! Works will all current patch versions.
State.Name: More Heads for Flutter and Whimsy

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mods adds some NPC Eye, Skin and Hair colours to character creation so you can pick them for your Tav or for your Dreamer. Such as Karlach, Astarion, Wyll, Gale and Lae'zel
State.Name: NPC (And Origins) Eye Skin and Hair Colours for Tav

State.Author: SwissFred
State.Description: Raphael Bed Story Learn that Raphael is bad in bed even after killing Haarlep.
State.Name: Raphael Bed Story

State.Author: reyqune
State.Description: Launches the game without any splash screen or audio from the splash screen video, goes directly to the main menu
State.Name: Silent No Splash Screen

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: Collection of hairstyles. Mostly for elf/half-elf/drow/human/tiefling bodytypes 1&2
State.Name: Tav's Hair Salon

State.Author: VitruvianGuar
State.Description: Allows Unarmored Defense to provide AC according 10 + WIS + CON (without DEX) for Monk/Barbarian multiclass
State.Name: Unarmored Defence Synergy

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Magical healing potions that look for any available healing potion of the same type in the party's inventory for convenience, no more splitting potion or looking for them inside 50 bags



May activate your 5G chip.
State.Name: Wifi potions v2 tm

State.Author: Kazstralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a Body Tattoo selector to CC. Requires Unique Tav or KAVT and KaiLimeUI.
State.Name: Kazstra's CC Body Tattoo Selector

Original.Name: Add Unarmed to Savage Attacks trait-2473-1-2-1695506544.zip

State.Author: jellytajm
State.Description: Add rerolls for unarmed attacks to the Savage Attacker feat. Add unarmed attacks to the Savage Attacks trait.
State.Name: Add Unarmed Attacks to Savage Attacker and Savage Attacks

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Restores discussion about Astarion's nightmare from Early Access
State.Name: Astarion's Nightmare - Restored from Early Access

State.Author: Sailor Cat
State.Description: Adds a toggleable passive for automation (AI control) of all summons during combat.
State.Name: Automated Summons

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds icons for contextual actions and makes widget slimmer and snappier.
State.Name: Better Context Menu

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves initiative tracker - makes it tighter and adds more info about combatants.
State.Name: Slightly Better Topbar

State.Author: Sailor Cat
State.Description: Summon won't end its turn? Forcibly end the current turn or combat with these Script Extender console commands.
State.Name: Combat Console Commands

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, glowing eye colors to CC, inspired by Tieflings and demonic themes.
State.Name: Demon Eyes - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: Parrot
State.Description: Minor quality of life tweaks for elixirs and potions.
State.Name: Elixirs Revised

State.Author: JiMarti
State.Description: Makes gold weight absolutely nothing.
State.Name: Gold Weights Nothing

State.Author: Primalfire
State.Description:
This mod fixes the dreaded issue of, "movement destination line",  revealing the location of invisible entities.

View mod page for pictures if you are not sure what this is.
State.Name: Invisibility Rules - Movement Line Fix

State.Author: perseidipity
State.Description: Adds various braids, buns, and ponytails from vanilla hairs as a separate selection.
State.Name: Kay's Hair Extensions

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new hair colors to CC. Includes natural & colorful tones and options for matching eyebrows and eyelashes.
State.Name: Astralities' Hair Color Supplement

State.Author: LightningLarryL
State.Description: There are a huge number of quips and comments for your companions in BG3 that only get used if you are playing as them. This mod repurposes all of those lines to be used as companion chatter. All lines play in the correct moment and match the situation. It really makes your party feel more alive!
State.Name: More Reactive Companions

State.Author: xmas214
State.Description: Ever unintentionally break a Paladin oath / keep pissing off Karlach / repeatedly pick the hardest skill checks / say something Gale took as a pick-up line?  OIO is here for you.
State.Name: OIO - Overexplained Interaction Options

State.Author: Nikjima
State.Description: Restores some cut/bugged dialogue for Raphael at Last Light Inn, both in the event Mol doesn't make it, and after freeing the Nightsong.
State.Name: Raphael Restored - Last Light Fixes

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Enjoy that vista. (actually, you can also make it faster through MCM)
State.Name: Slower Rosymorn Monastery Lift

State.Author: Rukongai
State.Description: The Book of Debugging / DebugBook / Debug Book. This mod allows you to use the Larian debugging tool, the Debug Book
State.Name: The Debug Book

State.Author: jonhinkerton
State.Description: Tired of switching to Astarion everytime you find a chest? This mod lets the active character use the highest bonus to sleight of hand in the party when picking locks, disarming traps, and picking pockets.
State.Name: Use Best Sleight of Hand

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: Withers no longer comments on your love life, or lack thereof, in Act 2 and Act 3. This also stops him from commenting on companions and hirelings' love lives. Works on new and old saves.
State.Name: Withers Minds His Business

State.Author: Ch4nKyy
State.Description: Explore Faerûn in an immersive Third-Person-View and use WASD to move your Heroes.
State.Name: WASD Character Movement

Original.Name: Unique Tav - Better Nipples for Normies-10350-1-0-0-0-1718546856.zip

State.Author: Mrissi
State.Description: Makes the nipples of Normies (Human, Elf, Drow and Half Elf) and Tieflings better for Unique Tav.
State.Name: Unique Tav - Better Nipples

State.Author: SASUKE31
State.Description: Allows the player to have a conversation with The Emperor when he is in the party during the finale and give him a hug if his romance arc was completed.
State.Name: Emperor Finale Follower Dialogue Extended

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Debuffs the player after a night of passion with Lae'zel
State.Name: Astral Pain - Lae'zel Romance Debuff

State.Author: OsirisOfGit
State.Description: Extensible, customizable Inventory Manager that redistributes items on pickup to their best fit, the way you tell it to! Able to send items to party members, the camp chest, or custom containers, using character and items stats. Balance out your consumable stacks, send arrows to your archers, and give your wizard all your scrolls!
State.Name: Automatic Inventory Manager (AIM)

State.Author: KiwiLifter darkynho Divaroma
State.Description: A mod making Dammon a bit tougher, and giving him an Infernal type weapon.
State.Name: Better Dammon

State.Author: Caites and desirecampbell
State.Description: Increases trade/barter grids and adds ability to choose and drag multiple items/stacks in Barter Mode.
State.Name: Slightly Better Trade Menu

Original.Name: Companion Gale Can Consume Shadow Weave-16877-1-0-1748454333.zip

State.Author: xJustAdam
State.Description: Companion Gale can consume or destroy the shadow weave for a unique passive previously exclusive to Origin Gale.
State.Name: Companion Gale Can Consume Shadow Weave

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for the "Burning" Effect, so that your log is not spammed by candles
State.Name: Disable combat log for Burning

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of 10 custom-made hairs. Most are autosnap.
State.Name: Em's Custom Hair Pack 1

State.Author: Goonsack
State.Description: Sick of Wyll getting turned to paste by your difficulty mods? Sick of grandma elf and her suicidal AI? This mod gives some potential companion characters buffs prior to being recruited, to save some hassle and even the playing field.
State.Name: Goon's Companion Protection

State.Author: SwissFred
State.Description:
Iron Throne Rescue Extended 

Extends the round timer in the Iron Throne mission, giving you a fairer chance to rescue all prisoners and grab the loot without removing the challenge.
State.Name: Iron Throne Rescue Extended

State.Author: perseidipity
State.Description: Adds various braids, buns, and ponytails from vanilla hairs as a separate selection.
State.Name: Kay's Hair Extensions

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes flow of dialogue when asking Minsc - "I'd like to know a little more about you".
State.Name: Minsc Dialogue Flow Fix

State.Author: adriant1978
State.Description: Ever wanted to adopt the cute white cat from the Lower City? Now you can!
State.Name: Myshka Comes To Camp

State.Author: xmas214
State.Description: Ever unintentionally break a Paladin oath / keep pissing off Karlach / repeatedly pick the hardest skill checks / say something Gale took as a pick-up line?  OIO is here for you.
State.Name: OIO - Overexplained Interaction Options

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Rebalances class spells - spells specific to classes or subclasses, not tied to spell level. This is not a class rebalance, passive abilities are not changed.
State.Name: Rebalance - Class Spells

State.Author: spacefaces
State.Description:
Shrinks the "Boo" created from "Find Familiar: Boo" down to the size he appears as in Minsc's hands/cutscenes.



Finally, a MINITURE giant space hamster.
State.Name: Smaller Boo

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: Your 4 favourite Lord of the Rings hobbits (unless Bilbo is your favourite)
State.Name: The Hobbits Head Presets by cedastarions

State.Author: PlainOldCookies
State.Description: In dialogue skill checks, use the highest modifier in your party.
State.Name: Use Highest Modifier in dialogue

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Restores the flirty party banter between Wyll, Lae'zel, and Shadowheart that was cut in Patch 4.
State.Name: Wyllzel Flirty Banter Restored - Wyll Cinematic Universe Mod 3 (WCU)

State.Author: wes47
State.Description: Mutes all music in Character Creation screen.
State.Name: No Character Creation Music

State.Author: Coyote31
State.Description: Improve Character, Party and Companions Panels. Also display All Types of Resistance including ones without any.
State.Name: Advanced Character Sheet (ACS)

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds 4 styles of animal ears to the Horn slot, for all Races except Dragonborn.
State.Name: Astralities Fluffy Ears

State.Author: Cyclonic
State.Description: Automatically hide summons when the character they are attached to enters stealth
State.Name: Automatically Hide Summons

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes dyeing UI faster and more convenient and dyes more recognizable in inventory.
State.Name: Slightly Better Dyeing (with all dye mods support)

State.Author: Caites and desirecampbell
State.Description: Increases trade/barter grids and adds ability to choose and drag multiple items/stacks in Barter Mode.
State.Name: Slightly Better Trade Menu

Original.Name: Companions Panel and Camp Chest Everywhere-4968-1-2-6-1744741991.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves Companions Panel, makes it (and Camp Chest) available from anywhere.
State.Name: Companions Panel and Camp Chest Everywhere

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Crusader's Mantle, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Crusader's Mantle

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of 10 custom-made hairs. All are autosnapping for all races and come with CC icons.
State.Name: Em's Custom Hair Pack 2

State.Author: cetriolo
State.Description:
An absolute fraud in a very nice coat — and not-so-nice boots. 

A simple edit to make Tyrannical Jackboots match the rest of Gortash's outfit.
State.Name: Gortash's Matching Boots - Fix His Clown-Red Faux Pas

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: Adds some goblin and gith based mashup/undercut hairs for Tav. Works on all characters and body types
State.Name: Jerinski's Alt Hairs

State.Author: Kylin3
State.Description: New assorted heads for character creation. At the moment for body type 1, 2 and 4 plus some for githyanki, gnome, dwarf and half-orc.
State.Name: Kylin's Heads

Original.Name: Minthara Romance Scene - Fixes and Changes-8411-1-0-1711933481.zip

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes and Changes to Minthara's Romance Scene
State.Name: Minthara Romance Scene - Fixes and Changes

State.Author: Bysell
State.Description: Rebalances the Necromancy of Thay.
State.Name: Necromancy of Thay Rebalance

Original.Name: Owlbear Cub Permanent Aggression Fix - Honor Mode-13220-1-1-0-1729465997.zip

State.Author: osirisofinternet
State.Description: If playing with Honor Mode Ruleset, killing the Owlbear Mother before the Mate will cause the Cub to remain in combat. This ensures that the appropriate flag is tripped in that scenario, allowing you to progress with the Cub's storyline. Safe to remove at any point.
State.Name: Owlbear Cub Permanent Aggression Fix on Honor Ruleset

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Reduces repetitive NPC banter by introducing delays before they repeat. Fully configurable through MCM.
State.Name: Reduce NPC Banter Repetitiveness

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description:
Create autosaves at intervals while avoiding saving during action - postpone saves for after dialogue, trading, combat, etc (fully configurable with a JSON file). 

Inspired by Aether's Auto Saver.
State.Name: Smart Autosaving

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: 4 Male Half-Orc head presets
State.Name: The Lads Head Presets

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod adds more colours for Tattoos, Lipstick and Makeup
State.Name: P4 Custom Tattoo and Makeup Colours

State.Author: GeneralLapDragon
State.Description: A simple color addition mod for Dragonborn. Currently adds two sets of new, non-replacer colors (two new swatches for each DGB subrace).
State.Name: Yet More Scales

State.Author: Lynia
State.Description: Removes the ugly white outline on tintable items that use the shader CHAR_BASE_AlphaTest_2S_Dither
State.Name: Alpha Dither Shader Fix - Replacer and Standalone

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds 4 styles of animal ears to the Horn slot, for all Races except Dragonborn.
State.Name: Astralities Fluffy Ears

State.Author: Hyperspace Towel
State.Description: This mod updates Karlach's final scene on the docks so that Wyll, if he became the Blade of Avernus, will accompany Karlach to the Hells with or without the main character's presence.
State.Name: Blade of Avernus saves Karlach (Act 3 spoilers) (ALPHA)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Increases number of slots on a hotbar's grid and adds one more slot category to main deck. Plus a few minor  QoL improvements.
State.Name: Better Hotbar 2

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes small widgets great again.
State.Name: Better Various Widgets

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: This is the Compatibility Framework. Split off from BG3 Community Library, this mod provides an API for other mods to use improve compatibility. Initially designed for Subclass Compatibility, the Framework has API endpoints that Script-Extender Enabled mods can hook into to insert values into Progressions, Feats, and Lists at Runtime.
State.Name: Compatibility Framework

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Silvanus Blessing, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Silvanus Blessing

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Another pack of 8 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 3

State.Author: labotor
State.Description: Allows for more variety in tiefling designs, essentially adds all tiefling horns (+ 12 extra and those from CustomHornsCollection) and tail options for all other races (except dragonborn). Currently doesn't add extra Tags, see mod recommendation for that.
State.Name: Half-Tiefs (Tiefling Horns and Tail for All)

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: 6 tiefling heads for b1! Merry Christmas!
State.Name: Jingle Tieflings by cedastarions

State.Author: Kylin3
State.Description: New horns with glow and accessories for tieflings of all body types.
State.Name: Kylin's Horns

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Unlocks additional alurlssrin dialogue with romanced Minthara
State.Name: Minthara's Alurlssrin

State.Author: Alahria
State.Description: Presets for BT1 and BT3 ♥
State.Name: Netherseam - Head Presets

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod adds more colours for Tattoos, Lipstick and Makeup
State.Name: P4 Custom Tattoo and Makeup Colours

State.Author: Gycicada
State.Description: Removes the annoying camera move from projectile attack and spells.
State.Name: Remove Camera Move

State.Author: PseudoKociara
State.Description: Three custom horns with glowing variant, plus one extra for body type 1 & 3.
State.Name: Some New Horns

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: 4 female half-orc heads that go along with my previous THE LADS﻿ pack.
State.Name: The Lasses Head Presets by cedastarions

State.Author: Kilay
State.Description: Fix icons of Auntie Ethel's Boon, BOOOAL's Blessing, Forbidden Knowledge and Slayer Knowledge
State.Name: Vanilla Missing Icons

Original.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat-4913-1-0-0-1701871013.zip

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: No modded items in the nautiloid tutorial chest. Summoned tutorial chests still contain mod items! For everyone who can't control their dark urge and gives in to temptation when seeing the tutorial chest (and for multiplayer).
State.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat

State.Author: hoagsie
State.Description: This is an alternative to Faster Dice Menu that's easier to follow but is still much, much faster.
State.Name: Faster Rolls Quartered

Original.Name: Unique Tav - Better Nipples for Tieflings-10350-1-0-0-0-1718546877.zip

State.Author: Mrissi
State.Description: Makes the nipples of Normies (Human, Elf, Drow and Half Elf) and Tieflings better for Unique Tav.
State.Name: Unique Tav - Better Nipples

State.Author: aPCSet
State.Description: With this mod, inspected containers remain open. You can visually see which containers you have already examined. Needs Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Script Extender!
State.Name: Already Inspected (Visual opened containers)

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod expands the colorful skintone selection by adding lighter and darker shades to Vanilla skintones, as well as a variety of new options. This version focuses on Fantasy skintones.
State.Name: Astralities' Fantasy Skintone Expansion

State.Author: lokelaniii
State.Description: 7 Nail styles and 3 Design options for BT1 and BT2 characters
State.Name: Baldur's Baddies (Nails -  Dyeable Nails)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

State.Author: Kiwi Weaponsmith
State.Description: All of my weapons mods UPDATED with NEW features as requested by users. All cleaned up and bundled together for warmth, now including all unique weapons and bug fixes.
State.Name: Better Weapons All in One Pack

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Allows setting a custom party size limit via MCM, ranging from 1 (solo) to 16 members, with a button to dismiss all companions.
State.Name: Configurable Party Limit

State.Author: Belinn
State.Description: Owlbear Egg can no longer be used as camp supplies.
State.Name: Do Not Eat Owlbear Egg

State.Author: iamy0urdad
State.Description: This mod fixes a very old issue when Arnell and Emmeline would not follow the party when Tav hires a room in the Elfsong tavern. With this mod, Hallowleafs will re-unite in all camps of act 3, including Rivington.
State.Name: Hallowleafs in Camp

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: After Nessa has been set free from Yurgir's charm and killing her former master she joins you on your adventures. She wants to complete hunts, killing specific types of enemies, granting her new abilities and passive bonuses.
State.Name: Justice For Nessa

State.Author: Sinus23
State.Description: This mod restores the reaction of Lae'zel when you kiss her, as Tav or Dark Urge.
State.Name: Lae'zel Kiss Dialogue

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Makes Minthara's poison kiss more likely to happen
State.Name: Minthara's Poison Kiss

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: New presets for character creation.
State.Name: New Character Creation Presets WIP

State.Author: Armarui
State.Description: A refactor of permanent bonuses for ergonomics. Prevents permanent bonuses from being lost after death, moves permanent conditions to the character sheet to declutter the HUD, and adds missing icons.
State.Name: Permanent Passives

State.Author: Lizapb
State.Description: This mod restores thousands  approvals which currently can't be triggered due to bugs in many scenes.
State.Name: Restore more than 4500 broken approvals

State.Author: BitterPast
State.Description: Everyone can use them. No Raging required. Optional Reusable, No FX and increased damage.
State.Name: Soul Coin Tweaks

State.Author: jawstarion
State.Description: Have you ever noticed those weird lines on the male Tiefling bodies? Well, now you have lol. This mod fixes that.
State.Name: Tiefling Texture Fix

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: This mod aims to fix dialogue bugs that still permeate the game and in the process restore content that was unintentionally cut.
State.Name: Various Dialogue Fixes

State.Author: yogurtdrink
State.Description: Some Half Orc and Elf head presets.
State.Name: Yogurt Heads - Half Orc and Elf Presets

State.Author: ArtByMari and Astralities
State.Description: Conversions of Mari's various Tattoo, Makeup & Scar Mods to function alongside KAVT! Includes custom CC icons.
State.Name: Mari's Tattoos Makeup and Scars for KAVT

State.Author: Bluesatin
State.Description:
Makes several changes to the Prone status (to reduce how debilitating/annoying it is): 

(1) Prone no longer instantly ends your turn if you have enough movement to recover. 

(2) Ranged attacks have disadvantage on Prone opponents.
State.Name: Alternative Prone Rules

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod enables glowing eyes for races without them - Humans, Elves, Drow, Half-Elves, Half-Orcs, Halflings, Dwarves, Gnomes & Githyanki, as well as modded races.
State.Name: Astralities' Glow Eyes

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: Welcome to Baldur's Circus! Performed in front of a live studio audience! Laughter when you fail, applause when you succeed! And more! Come enjoy the show!
State.Name: Baldur's Circus (Laugh Track Mod)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: wes47
State.Description: Changes all ingame mouse cursors to look like the ones from Baldur's Gate 2.
State.Name: BG2 Mouse Cursors

State.Author: AkELkA
State.Description:
NON-REPLACER. 

Adds new crystal crest tops, jaws, tails for male Dragonborns
State.Name: Crystal Crown - Gem Dragonborn CC pack

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds additional color options for Draconic Sorcerer's facial scales.
State.Name: Draconic Scales - Color Expansion

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Epilogue party dialog bug fixes for Astarion, Halsin, Jaheira, Lae'zel, Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll, and Origin Karlach
State.Name: Epilogue bug fixes

State.Author: Coyote31
State.Description: The aim of this mod is to improve the discernibility of the North on the minimap.
State.Name: Highlight North

State.Author: Kiwi Mixed Breed
State.Description: Brings together all my Race mods, with updated Humans, Half Orcs, and Half Elves. Eventually, I will add as many NPCs as possible too.
State.Name: Better Races All in One

State.Author: Magnetuning
State.Description: Changes the amount of generic crowd characters allowed in Act 3. Provides two options: one that roughly halves the amount of crowd characters, and one that removes them entirely.
State.Name: Less Crowd Characters

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Restores an unused conversation between Astarion, Minthara, and the Emperor
State.Name: Minthara's Weaknesses - Astarion Minthara Banter Restored

Original.Name: New Character Creation Presets - Unique Tav Patch-16924-1-0-1748644734.zip

State.Author: Astralities and Toarie
State.Description: This Mod adds compatibility with Unique Tav and KAVT to Toarie's New Character Creation Presets.
State.Name: New Character Creation Presets - Unique Tav and KAVT Patch

State.Author: Tilith
State.Description: Five (+two legacy) versions from easier to realistic and harder with optional files to increase weapon's weight.
State.Name: Pickpocketing Tweaks

State.Author: Nikjima
State.Description: Restores cut/bugged content for Rugan the Zhentarim, allowing him to appear in Act 3
State.Name: Rugan Restored - A Sweet Sight

State.Author: Sparrow
State.Description: Adds eighteen new dragonborn scale colours with bright gold highlights. (Non-replacer.)
State.Name: Sparrow's Gilded Dragonscales (New Dragonborn Scale Colours)

State.Author: Ajax and LillyBird
State.Description: Listonomicon is a Wabbajack/MO2-powered alternative to Collections and Vortex. It brings over 200 mods pre-configured and play tested to your next BG3 playthrough
State.Name: Listonomicon - A BG3 Wabbajack Overhaul Modlist

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: This mod aims to fix dialogue bugs that still permeate the game and in the process restore content that was unintentionally cut.
State.Name: Various Dialogue Fixes

State.Author: Seristiina
State.Description:
Restores Z’rell’s ogre execution in Moonrise Towers (Act 2).

Script Extender mod that asserts the correct include flag and ensures the ogre is considered when the dialog starts. No vanilla file overrides. Install SE, place the pak, put last in load order, export, play, see Z'rell off her ogre bodyguard.
State.Name: Z'rell Ogre Execution Restored

State.Author: UndefinedScribble
State.Description: Removes the bras from dragonborn underwear.
State.Name: And Hold the Bra - A Dragonborn Underwear Mod

Original.Name: Unique Tav and KAVT Compatibility Patch-4964-2-0-1751016633.zip

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod enables glowing eyes for races without them - Humans, Elves, Drow, Half-Elves, Half-Orcs, Halflings, Dwarves, Gnomes & Githyanki, as well as modded races.
State.Name: Astralities' Glow Eyes

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library is designed to be a set of common data that any mod may draw from. This includes Scripts, Spells, Statuses, Passives, etc.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: Adds big, long beards, only for dwarven character
State.Name: Big Dwarven Beards

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves cursor text panel - adds damage numbers, damage type icons and warns about replacing concentration spell.
State.Name: Better Cursor Text Panel

State.Author: ChizFreak
State.Description: Rework of Dragonborn Racials and Breath Weapon (inspired on Fizban's Treasury of Dragons book). New Dragonborn abilities with new custom icons, breath weapon creates elemental surfaces and apply status, uses based on charges system, use your Dragon Breath as part of Extra Attacks and more!
State.Name: Dragonborn and Breath Weapon Enhanced - inspired by Fizban's Treasury of Dragons

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Unlocks the swimming scene if DJ Shadowheart makes a certain decision in Act 3.
State.Name: Ex-Sharran Swimming Lessons for Shadowheart

State.Author: lumad11
State.Description: Adds 7 new custom made horns to the CC for tieflings of all body types
State.Name: Hornology - A Custom Horns Mod

State.Author: KaiLimePie
State.Description: Expanded, rearranged, and streamlined UI for character creator appearance and the mirror.
State.Name: Kai's Overhauled Appearance Interface aka KaiLimeUI

State.Author: commanderstrawberry
State.Description: Makes females emote less dramatically by editing wrinkle map. Now with some males!
State.Name: Less Wrinkled Expression and Forehead for Face

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Unlocks Shadowheart's Act 3 romance scene if you missed your chance to learn that she likes night orchids and can't swim
State.Name: Missed Connections - Shadowheart

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Fixes a Nightsong Points bug that prevents Shadowheart from making a big decision on her own in Act 3
State.Name: Nightsong Points Bug Fix

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: A variety of piercing mashups available as new sets or replacers. Compatibility with Trips' Accessories and Magic Mirror. Includes guide for DIY.
State.Name: Piercing Edits

State.Author: OsirisofGit
State.Description: (BETA BUILD) - Fixes the frustrating mix of turn-based and real-time gameplay when attempting to launch an ambush against enemies. Pulls your party into your attack, maintaining their stealth status, ensures surprise rounds happen, and enables actual stealth-combat, reapplying sneak status when you would otherwise lose it. 100% MCM Configurable!
State.Name: Sensible Ambushing - Stealth Combat Overhaul

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Sorts spell lists by level and (localised) name.
State.Name: Spell List Sorter

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: ZiplocBag42069
State.Description:
New Head! 



Twelve new heads for character creation. 



HEAD COMMISSIONS OPEN!!!
State.Name: Zip's Heads

State.Author: Aether
State.Description: Removes padding around the loading screen image, also removes the vignette. Adds a drop shadow and stroke to hints
State.Name: Aether's Better Loading Screens

State.Author: Eralyne
State.Description: Enables changing ANY character's body type and race, as well as editing Origin characters in the Mirror.
State.Name: Appearance Edit Enhanced

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds a variety of new hair colors to CC, including both natural and vivid tones and options for matching eyebrows & eyelashes. A continuation of my Hair Color Supplement.
State.Name: Astralities' Hair Color Collection

State.Author: Kelocena
State.Description: This mod cleans you on successfully ending the day and transitioning to nighttime. And you get a cantrip called Grime Begone that will remove your active party's dirt buildup any time. The cantrip will be automatically added to your hotbar. You can also find it in your spellsheet under the Common tab.
State.Name: Bath Before Bed (Clean Camp Nights)

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Enhances photo mode by allowing real-time customization of camera parameters. Adjust camera speed, rotation speed, range, and focus smoothing via MCM. Features quick speed modifiers (fast/slow modes) via hotkeys.
State.Name: Better Photo Mode

State.Author: BaldursGoonsack
State.Description: Prevent NPCs dying while Non-Lethal Attacks are toggled on, overhauls the system for knocking characters out to be streamlined and foolproof.
State.Name: Bonk Enhanced - Knocked Out Failsafe - Non-Lethal Attacks and Damage Overhaul

State.Author: Ark
State.Description: This mod enhances the Dark Urge origin with unique mechanics. Upon falling in battle, you’ll rise again with renewed strength but face lingering consequences. Balancing power and risk, the mod adds depth to your Dark Urge experience a bit.
State.Name: Dark Urge - Rebirth

State.Author: Nikjima
State.Description: Dror Ragzlin's death no longer makes the entire Goblin Camp hostile if the alarm isn't raised.
State.Name: Dror Aggrn't - No more hostile goblin camp

State.Author: Aloija
State.Description: A new heads for character creation
State.Name: Faces of Faerun

State.Author: lumad11
State.Description: 7 new non-replacer horns for tieflings of all body types!
State.Name: Horns of Plenty

State.Author: KaiLimePie
State.Description: Adds a small handful(10) of new illithid-themed, very very vaguely spoilery named, eye colors to the character creation and magic mirror interfaces.
State.Name: KaiLime Eyes - Illithid Soul

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Restores missing reactivity and bugged content across the game
State.Name: Lesser Restoration - Assorted Bug Fixes

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Bug fix unlocking the dialogue option to "truly connect" with Shadowheart
State.Name: Missed Connections - Shadowheart - Truly Connect

State.Author: PixellBytes
State.Description: Adds various ways to make your playthrough more difficult, along with the ability to have enemies get stronger automatically as your party grows in size. This mod is extremely customizable, with all settings being configurable in-game!
State.Name: Tactician Enhanced

State.Author: ChizFreak
State.Description: Fixes the upcasting bug of the new Shadow Blade that makes it lose its damage bonus whenever any status ends on the weapon.
State.Name: Shadow Blade Upcasting BUGFIX

State.Author: Zarnos
State.Description: This mod prevents other versions of Bless from overwriting Sweet Stone Features (the buff from purchasing a statue of yourself). Most other ways of obtaining Bless only last a few turns so it makes no sense that the would overwrite Sweet Stone Features which is supposed to be permanent.
State.Name: StatueBlessFix

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: starcityjespar
State.Description: Replaces Astarion's "grinch" smile with one of his other smile animations (Now includes an option to make the grinch face permanent)
State.Name: Astarion Unusual Smile Animation Replacer

State.Author: Eralyne
State.Description: Enables changing ANY character's body type and race, as well as editing Origin characters in the Mirror.
State.Name: Appearance Edit Enhanced

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new hair colors to CC. Includes natural & colorful tones and options for matching eyebrows and eyelashes.
State.Name: Astralities' Hair Color Supplement

State.Author: almasy87
State.Description: Lets Scratch dig out treasures for you
State.Name: Best Boy Can Dig -  Scratch Shovel

State.Author: Kiwi Mixed Breed
State.Description: Brings together all my Race mods, with updated Humans, Half Orcs, and Half Elves. Eventually, I will add as many NPCs as possible too.
State.Name: Better Races All in One

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Gale reacts when you sit by him in camp.
State.Name: Book Club With Gale

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Edits for a more immersive Durge playthrough, including replacing the "Twee" line for Astarion and companion reactions to Quil's fate. ⚠️ CONTAINS DURGE SPOILERS ⚠️
State.Name: Dark Urge Tweeaks

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Rework of Wildshape charges, working multi-class skills in Wild Shape, swapping from Wild Shape to Wild Shape directly and more
State.Name: Druid Perfection

Original.Name: Faces of Faerun - Unique Tav Patch-17190-1-0-1750133556.zip

State.Author: Astralities and Aloija
State.Description: This Mod adds compatibility with Unique Tav and KAVT to Aloija's Faces of Faerun.
State.Name: Faces of Faerun - Unique Tav Patch

State.Author: Berry
State.Description: Replaces game fonts with Atkinson Hyperlegible and changes certain UI assets to aid in low vision reading.
State.Name: Hyperlegible Readability (A font for Dyslexia and Low Vision)

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Spend more time getting to know Karlach on your hot date
State.Name: Karlach Romance - Better Hot Date

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Restores missing reactivity and bugged content across the game
State.Name: Lesser Restoration - Assorted Bug Fixes

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Provides an in-game graphical interface that allows players to intuitively manage mod settings and custom mod widgets.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: AkELkA
State.Description: Adds No Crest option to All Vanillas
State.Name: No Crest for Dragonborn - Toolkit

State.Author: PseudoKociara
State.Description: Some simple horns for tieflings, for all four body types.
State.Name: PK Horns 2

State.Author: gosh
State.Description: Adds shadows to light cast by torches. Fixes erroneous light reflections and light bleeding through objects. Actors, architecture, items cast shadows in torchlight. Make game more moody. Make game more gorgeous.
State.Name: Shadowed Torches (now with Shadowcasting)

State.Author: whatsontheflip
State.Description: Allows you to stomp on the Astral-Touched Tadpole — even if you've already consumed tadpoles.
State.Name: Stomp that Tadpole

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: AIMRYAX
State.Description: Fixes the visual artefact at the corner of character's mouths.
State.Name: Visual Artefact Fix

State.Author: WoolToque
State.Description: Several changes to Arcane Acuity to make it less overpowered, while still providing consistent value. Replaces the broken bonus for Gloves of Battlemage's Power. Includes versions capping Arcane Acuity at 3 or 5.
State.Name: Arcane Acuity Rework

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod overhauls Vanilla hair colors by adding Variants with matching eyebrows and/or eyelashes.
State.Name: Astralities' Hair Color Overhaul

State.Author: Kiwi Mail Man
State.Description: Gives you a reason to select one type of Armor over another.
State.Name: Better Armor

State.Author: Kiwi Lifter
State.Description: A simple mod that enhances the stats of the Shadow Druids, including Khaga!
State.Name: Better Shadow Druids

State.Author: ChizFreak
State.Description: Fixes the bug that prevents Booming Blade from interacting with various elemental-boosting items.
State.Name: Booming Blade BUGFIX

State.Author: Stanto
State.Description:
Do you feel for a vampire lair, it's too bright with its ambient lighting?

Do you have an OLED and crave for more inky blacks in your game?

Be sure to check out 'Darker Underdark', 'Darker Shar Temple', 'Darker Shadowlands' and 'Darker Grymforge'.
State.Name: Darker Cazador's Palace

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Quality of Life and Fixes - Druid is among the least played classes in Baldurs Gate 3 and 5e DnD and feels neglected. As face of the party or Tav it is especially unpleasant. This mod fixes that and much more.Re-casting spells, lockpicking, pickpocketing & more in Wild Shape, ritual Wild Shapes and many other QoL features and bug fixes.
State.Name: Druid Quality of Life

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, glowing eye colors to CC, inspired by the Feywild and folklore.
State.Name: Feywild Eyes - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: Berry
State.Description: Replaces game fonts with Atkinson Hyperlegible and changes certain UI assets to aid in low vision reading.
State.Name: Hyperlegible Readability (A font for Dyslexia and Low Vision)

State.Author: Lumaterian
State.Description: Changes the look of Karlach's starter clothes
State.Name: Karlach's Barbarian Clothes - Starting Equipment

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod expands the natural skin tone selection available in CC to allow for more diverse customization.
State.Name: LIFELIKE - Skin Tone Expansion

State.Author: tinybike
State.Description: Disables the free heal-to-full many NPCs get when they're out-of-combat.
State.Name: No Free NPC Heals

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: A couple of my Cyberpunk hair mods, ported to BG3. Works on all races/body types.
State.Name: Planewalker's Barbershop - Short hairstyles

State.Author: gosh
State.Description: Adds shadows to light cast by torches. Fixes erroneous light reflections and light bleeding through objects. Actors, architecture, items cast shadows in torchlight. Make game more moody. Make game more gorgeous.
State.Name: Shadowed Torches (now with Shadowcasting)

State.Author: HyperspaceTowel
State.Description: Slight tweaks to Gale's tiefling party conversation about Tara to help you stop romancing him by accident
State.Name: Stop accidentally dating Gale

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: Team Me
State.Description: Mainly makes the flute less bulky, and while keeping the length.
State.Name: Smaller Flute
